property.name: text
property.value: When a ball hits the other ball with an error er, it changes the sign of its velocity.

property.name: text
property.value: This is a simplified model of a billiard ball given by X(k)=X(k-1) + Vx (same for the Y). The step time is given by delta=1. It starts from an initial position (x_,y_), and evolves in a table with 500x100. Each time the ball reaches the border, the velocity changes its sign.

property.name: text
property.value: When the ball hits another one, it changes its sign.
